trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a design host for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Ger stöd för designtid i en design som värd för den <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner class is the base class for data source designers, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> classes.
trans-unit.target: Klassen DataSourceDesigner är basklass för datakällan designers som den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner>, och <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner>klasser.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.AccessDataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.SqlDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If you create a new data source control, you might also want to create a custom control designer for your control and derive it from the DataSourceDesigner class.
trans-unit.target: Om du skapar en ny kontroll för datakälla kan du också skapa en anpassad kontroll designer för kontrollen och härleds från klassen DataSourceDesigner.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner class has two event methods: the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: DataSourceDesigner klassen har två händelsemetoder: den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>och <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A>metoder.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both of these events can be temporarily disabled with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method, which sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Båda dessa händelser kan inaktiveras tillfälligt med den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>-metoden, som anger den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event methods can be enabled again with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Händelsemetoder kan aktiveras igen med den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are two static methods that you can use to evaluate the equivalency of schemas or views without creating an instance of the class: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A> method compares two schemas.
trans-unit.target: Det finns två statiska metoder som du kan använda för att utvärdera de systemen är likvärdiga med scheman eller vyer utan att skapa en instans av klassen: – <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A>metoden Jämför två scheman.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemasEquivalent%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A> method compares the schemas of two views.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A>Metoden jämför scheman för två vyer.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ViewSchemasEquivalent%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The DataSourceDesigner constructor is called by the design host at design time.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktorn DataSourceDesigner anropas av design-värden vid designtillfället.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of items that are used to create an action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en lista med objekt som används för att skapa en lista över Åtgärd-menyn i designläge.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"></xref> object containing the action list items for the control designer.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection"> </xref> objekt som innehåller åtgärden listobjekt för kontrollen designer.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*>metod kan anropas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: Use the CanConfigure property in a custom class to enable or disable design-time configuration for a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: Använd egenskapen CanConfigure i en anpassad klass för att aktivera eller inaktivera designläge konfigurationen för en specifik datakälla.

trans-unit.source: A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses the CanConfigure property to determine whether a command to configure the data source appears in the action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: En design-värd som [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] använder egenskapen CanConfigure för att avgöra om ett kommando för att konfigurera datakällan visas i listan Åtgärd-menyn i designläge.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*> can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*>kan vara kallas, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.Configure*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method can be called.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>metod kan anropas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Use the CanRefreshSchema property in a derived class to enable or disable the ability to refresh the schema at design time for a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: Använd egenskapen CanRefreshSchema i en härledd klass för att aktivera eller inaktivera möjligheten att uppdatera schemat i designläge för en specifik datakälla.

trans-unit.source: If your application requires an invariant data structure and the schema will never change, you want the CanRefreshSchema property to return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Om ditt program kräver en invariant datastruktur och schemat ändras aldrig, vill du egenskapen CanRefreshSchema att returnera `false`.

trans-unit.source: A design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses the CanRefreshSchema property to determine whether a command to refresh the schema appears in the action list menu at design time.
trans-unit.target: En design-värd som [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] använder egenskapen CanRefreshSchema för att avgöra om ett kommando för att uppdatera schemat visas i listan Åtgärd-menyn i designläge.

trans-unit.source: In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you can see the CanRefreshSchema property in action by completing the following process: 1.
trans-unit.target: I en värd som [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], du kan se egenskapen CanRefreshSchema i åtgärden genom att fylla i följande process: 1.

trans-unit.source: On your page, place a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> or an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: På sidan, placera en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>eller en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In Design view, on the action list, click **Configure**.
trans-unit.target: I designvyn på listan åtgärd klickar du på **konfigurera**.

trans-unit.source: Remove a few fields from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Ta bort några fält från datakällan.

trans-unit.source: On the action list, click **Refresh Schema**.
trans-unit.target: Klicka på listan åtgärd **uppdatera Schema**.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> can be called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>kan vara kallas, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardvärdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Launches the data source configuration utility in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Startar konfigurationsverktyget för datakällan i design-värden.

trans-unit.source: The Configure method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class; however, it can be overridden by custom data source designers inheriting from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Konfigurera-metoden stöds inte i den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>klassen; men den kan åsidosättas av anpassade datakälla designers arv från <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>klass.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: In a design host such as [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], you can see the Configure method in action by completing the following process: 1.
trans-unit.target: I en värd som [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], du kan se Konfigurera-metoden i åtgärden genom att fylla i följande process: 1.

trans-unit.source: Put a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> or an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control on your page.
trans-unit.target: Placera en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>eller en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>kontroll på sidan.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: In Design view, on the action list, clicking **Configure**.
trans-unit.target: I designvyn i åtgärden listan och klickar på **konfigurera**.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.
trans-unit.target: Ett försök gjordes att anropa denna metod i basklassen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when any property of the associated data source changes.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när en egenskap av den associerade datakällan ändras.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the HTML markup for displaying the associated data source control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar HTML-koden för att visa associerade datakällkontrollen vid designtillfället.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the GetDesignTimeHtml method returns the result from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Standardimplementering av metoden GetDesignTimeHtml returnerar resultatet från basklassen <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metod.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.CreatePlaceHolderDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The markup for the design-time display.
trans-unit.target: Koden för designtid visning.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"></xref> object that is identified by the view name.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som identifieras av vynamnet.

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, if `viewName` does not exist, the GetView method should return `null`.
trans-unit.target: I härledda klasser, om `viewName` finns inte, GetView metoden ska returnera `null`.

trans-unit.source: The name of the view.
trans-unit.target: Namnet på vyn.

trans-unit.source: This implementation always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den här implementeringen alltid returnerar <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the view names that are available in this data source.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar en matris med de namn som är tillgängliga i den här datakällan.

trans-unit.source: An array of view names.
trans-unit.target: En matris med vynamn.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event when the properties of the data source have changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"> </xref> händelse när egenskaperna för datakällan har ändrats och <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>värdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source to refresh its control in the design host.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceChanged meddelar kontrollen designers för varje kontroll som är kopplat till den associerade datakällan för att uppdatera dess i design-värden.

trans-unit.source: The OnDataSourceChanged method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnDataSourceChanged kan undertryckas med den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>metoden eller genom att anropa den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>metod med ett argument av `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object provided by the calling object.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt som tillhandahålls av objektet anropande.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> event when the schema of the data source has changed and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*> value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Genererar den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"> </xref> händelse när schemat för datakällan har ändrats och <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>värdet är <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: The OnSchemaRefreshed method notifies the control designers of each control that is bound to the associated data source that the fields in the schema have changed.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSchemaRefreshed meddelar kontrollen designers för varje kontroll som är kopplad till den associerade datakällan som fält i schemat har ändrats.

trans-unit.source: The OnSchemaRefreshed method can be suppressed with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> method or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> property with an argument of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnSchemaRefreshed kan undertryckas med den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>metoden eller genom att anropa den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>egenskap med ett argument av `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Ett <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Refreshes the schema from the data source, while optionally suppressing events.
trans-unit.target: Uppdaterar schemat från datakällan, när du undertrycka händelser.

trans-unit.source: The RefreshSchema method is not supported in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RefreshSchema stöds inte i <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: However, it is supported in derived classes, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Dock stöds i härledda klasser, till exempel <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner>klass.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to allow events when refreshing the schema; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to disable the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"></xref> events when refreshing the schema.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att tillåta händelser när du uppdaterar schemat; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att inaktivera den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"> </xref> och <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed"> </xref> händelser när du uppdaterar schemat.

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.
trans-unit.target: Ett försök gjordes att anropa denna metod i basklassen.

trans-unit.source: Restores data source events after the data source events have been suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Återställer datakällhändelser när data source-händelser har ignorerats.

trans-unit.source: Data source events can be suppressed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A> property to `false` or by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Data source-händelser kan förhindras genom att ange den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A>egenskapen `false` eller genom att anropa den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>metod med ett argument av `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressingDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to invoke this method in the base class.
trans-unit.target: Ett försök gjordes att anropa denna metod i basklassen.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the schema has been refreshed.
trans-unit.target: Inträffar när schemat har uppdaterats.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som ska läggas till.

trans-unit.source: Provides a value that indicates whether two schemas are equal.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller ett värde som anger om två scheman är lika.

trans-unit.source: Comparison of the two schemas is based on the views, as well as the names and types of the fields that are contained in the views.
trans-unit.target: Jämförelse av de två scheman baserat på vyer, samt namn och typer för vilka fält som ingår i vyerna.

trans-unit.source: The SchemasEquivalent method can be used without an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: SchemasEquivalent-metoden kan användas utan en instans av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The first schema to compare (derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Det första schemat att jämföra (härledd från den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceSchema"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: The second schema to compare.
trans-unit.target: Andra schemat ska jämföras.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both schemas are equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om båda scheman är likvärdiga; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Postpones all data source events until after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Skjuter upp alla datakällhändelser förrän efter den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*>metoden anropas.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.ResumeDataSourceEvents*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"></xref> event or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*> method occurs.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged"> </xref> händelse eller <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>metoden inträffar.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema*>

trans-unit.source: The SuppressingDataSourceEvents property can be set by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> method with an argument of `true`.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen SuppressingDataSourceEvents kan anges genom att anropa den <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A>metod med ett argument av `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SuppressDataSourceEvents%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if events are being suppressed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>om händelser som ignoreras; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides a value that determines whether two schema views are equal.
trans-unit.target: Innehåller ett värde som avgör om två vyer för schema är lika.

trans-unit.source: The ViewSchemasEquivalent method can be used without an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: ViewSchemasEquivalent-metoden kan användas utan en instans av <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The first view to compare (derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Den första vyn för att jämföra (härleds från den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: The second view to compare.
trans-unit.target: Den andra vyn ska jämföras.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both views are equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om båda vyerna är likvärdiga; Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
